attributes.additional_details:
In a democracy the government is expected to execute the wishes of the public whom they serve.

The house of Lords is an archaic establishment that hinders the elected governments ability to execute the wishes of the people and as such should be abolished.

Inherited power has no place in a democracy.

The 'Rich' should not be allowed to dictate laws and legislation based on their financial worth or 'lineage'

It's time to truly allow the people to choose how their country is run !
attributes.background: I would like to see the UK government act as a true representative of the people without the hinderance and obstruction of the house of lords.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300395
